ptlrpc_sec Struct Reference
[sptlrpc]

The ptlrpc_sec represents the client side ptlrpc security facilities, each obd_import (both regular and reverse import) must associate with a ptlrpc_sec. More...

Detailed Description

The ptlrpc_sec represents the client side ptlrpc security facilities, each obd_import (both regular and reverse import) must associate with a ptlrpc_sec.

See also:
sptlrpc_import_sec_adapt().
